ComicInfo.Summary: The Anatomy Lesson: General Sunderland hires Jason Woodrue to examine Swamp Thing and determine how Alec Holland became the monster, but Woodrue discovers that Swamp Thing only thinks that he was Alec Holland. When Sunderland fires Woodrue, the scientist allows Swamp Thing to take revenge on Sunderland for the both of them.
ComicInfo.Tags: Swamp Thing,Linda Holland,Floronic Man,Washington D.C.,General Sunderland,Louisiana
ComicInfo.Title: The Anatomy Lesson
